title.value: A rapid review for developing a co-design framework for a pediatric surgical communication application
title.justification: The title is explicitly mentioned at the beginning of the paper.
title.quote: A rapid review for developing a co-design framework for a pediatric surgical communication application

extractions.description: This paper presents a rapid review aimed at developing a co-design framework for a pediatric surgical communication application, focusing on the use of mobile health (mHealth) applications and stakeholder engagement in pediatric surgery.

type.justification: The paper conducts a review and develops a framework, which aligns with theoretical research aimed at understanding and proposing new ways of designing applications.
type.quote: This review aims to summarize previously published uses of co-design in mHealth applications... It will inform the development of a local mHealth tool in pediatric surgery.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on mobile health applications and their co-design, particularly in pediatric care.
name.quote: This review aims to summarize previously published uses of co-design in mHealth applications.

name.justification: The focus on developing frameworks for pediatric surgical communication applications indicates this as a subfield.
name.quote: ...inform the development of a pediatric surgery mHealth application.

name.justification: The entire paper revolves around the concept of co-design in healthcare applications.
name.quote: Co-design in healthcare is an approach that promotes collective creativity across all phases of the design process.
